        public Response removeClass(HttpServletRequest request,
                            java.lang.String strInputData)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to remove the selected class. This method is based on EXCSecurityRuleRemove.jsp which will be invoked on remove operation as part of OOTB Remove command.
        Parameters:

        strInputData - : String object selects
        Returns:
        : String json with list of Security Classes
